An introduction to dose-response curves, which are the basis for the current approaches to the quantitative characterization of drug response. This introduction includes an interactive exploration of the various parameters that determine the shapes of drug response curves.

This interactive tool gives a panoramic view of all the dose-response curves reported in Fallahi-Sichani et al., 2013.

Browse cell line vs. cell line and drug vs. drug scatterplots of several dose-response metrics.
